file_insights.changes: Added comprehensive section on Medusa 2.0 e-commerce backend

patterns_discovered: Detailed, structured documentation with ASCII architecture diagrams
Modular backend architecture with clear separation of concerns
Resource limit planning with explicit rationale
gotchas_discovered: Need to generate secure secrets for production
Multiple database deployment options (local, Docker, Supabase)
recommendations: Use environment variables for sensitive configuration
Implement strict product and resource limits
Consider separate environments for development and production
Use Docker for consistent local development environment
